resources.string: "Don't have an account? Sign up here!"
"Have an account already? Log in here!"
"You may need internet connection to login."
"You may need internet connection to sign up."
"Hmmm, your connection may have a problem."
"Your connection may have a few problems."
"You need an internet connection to continue..."
"Your back online, you may now continue."
"This may be the last ad we've got for you today."
"This is where all the stats concerning ads you've seen and money you can claim is stored."
"You cannot pin this without an internet connection"
"We're unable to unpin that right now."
"Your connection may be low,try again after a few moments."
"You may need internet connection to Upload your Advert."
"Note that once you pay, you can upload your advert at any time."
"Images are compressed to save on our database space. "
"Thanks for using the AdCafé to advertise your product."
FYI: You\'re able to monitor the progress of your ads from the dashboard.(By clicking the Big Button Marked "FIND OUT")
"Something went wrong,try uploading again after a few minutes."
"The number shown is by 1000 (*1000 users). Select having that in mind."
"So make sure you pick before making any payments."
"We've just sent you a confirmation email. Head over to your inbox to verify and activate your account(Worry not, its only a one time thing)."
It\'s basically an app for advertising information, products and all types of services to users from across the country.
Basically you\'ll be able to view ads uploaded by advertisers in the app and also advertise your product to the app\'s users.
You will be able to earn money! By just viewing the ads, you can make extra cash. Cool right?
Even better! Among other benefits, the AdCafe gives you the ability to reach many of its users in a very short period of time.
Not quite yet! First you\'ll need to know how to use the app and for that we\'ve prepared a short tutorial on how you will interact with it.
